Question: In the 2016 movie 'Norm of the North', how is the character Norm similar to Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer?
Options:
A. Both characters perceive their unique abilities as disadvantages at first.
B. Both characters are afraid of humans.
C. Both characters are traditional holiday figures.
D. Both characters have magical powers.
Answer: Both characters perceive their unique abilities as disadvantages at first.
